ticket.title: Thor LoadError message should not output --dev twice
ticket.original-body:
When running the app generator without Thor available, it prints out an error message telling you you should have Thor and you should append `--dev` to the command:
@@@ If you ran this command from a git checkout of Rails, please make sure thor is installed, and run this command as `ruby source/bin/rails ticket_6427 --dev` @@@
If you're already appending `--dev`, it'll tell you to to run the command with `--dev --dev`:
@@@ If you ran this command from a git checkout of Rails, please make sure thor is installed, and run this command as `ruby source/bin/rails ticket_6427 --dev --dev` @@@
This was because the error message simply appended "--dev" to anything. I've attached a patch that only adds it when you're not already doing it.
